Product Classification.fallbackLogic: If insufficient results from USMCA data, use HS master
Product Classification.uiOutput: HS codes with rates and descriptions

Savings Calculator.fallbackLogic: Country-based averages if no exact match

USMCA Compliance.fallbackLogic: Zero rates if no data found

Insufficient Real Data.trigger: Less than 5 results from primary data source

Empty User Tables.action: Return sample user data for demo
Empty User Tables.impact: Admin dashboard shows demo users, not real data

Missing HS Code.trigger: HS code not found in primary tables

API Error Handling.action: Return error response or empty results

WorkflowResults.js.dataFlow: Show final results â†’ Calculate savings â†’ Generate certificate

Admin Dashboards.dataFlow: Display management data â†’ Fallback to samples if empty
